DOC.brief_summary: The major goals of this project are to determine whether primary intervention through delayed introduction of dietary gluten is feasible and could reduce the incidence of islet autoimmunity in high-risk first degree relatives of patients with type 1 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: BABYDIET-Study - Primary Prevention of Type 1 Diabetes in Relatives at Increased Genetic Risk
DOC.criteria: Newborn offspring or siblings of patients with type 1 diabetes with a HLA genotype conferring a high diabetes risk If infants have an illness or birth defect that precludes longterm followup or involves use of treatment that may alter the natural history of diabetes
